projects.title: Programmed Line Follower
projects.description: Worked on getting an arduino-based car moving with the Arduino chip as the controller, using sensors and programming. Helped me get better at SolidWorks and Arduino-based Coding.

projects.title: React Website
projects.alt: Screenshot of React website with Spotify integration
projects.description: Worked on a team to make a React-based website which allowed users to connect to their Spotify and listen to music and share what they were listening to with friends, featuring a pomodoro timer and task management.

projects.title: Mini-Computer in VHDL
projects.alt: RTL schematic and input output waveform view
projects.description: Using VHDL, created a mini computer capable of performing basic commands like add, subtract, bitshifts etc. Helped me better understand assembly and hardware design.
